resources.string: We need your location to enable Geofencing. Only when Geolocation is enabled, we can log your time. Geofencing is used to verify that you\'re on Site.

Please enter your phone number. Remember that you must be already authorised by your employer to use this application. Do not include country code while entering your phone number - Example : 022345678
Hey there, just make sure that these details are correct. For user authentication, a SMS with the verification code will be sent to your registered phone number, when you press the button.
Hello there! Looks like we\'ve encountered a serious network error. Please restart the app and connect it to a stable internet connection.

Hello ! Just hang in there. We will send an SMS to your registered mobile number with the Verification Code. The app will automatically recognise it and move on to your home page. Your patience is appreciated.

A fatal network error seems to have occurred. Please clear all of the app data or re install the app and please ensure that you have a stable internet connection while signing into the app for the first time.
In order to verify your phone number automatically we need your permission to receive and read the verification SMS that will be sent to you. Please press OK to navigate to the permissions dialog.
